dt: {bc}a handheld device that aids in accomplishing a task
{bc}the cutting or shaping part in a machine or machine tool
{bc}something (such as an instrument or apparatus) used in performing an operation or necessary in the practice of a vocation or profession
{bc}an element of a computer program (such as a graphics application) that activates and controls a particular function

dt.t: a book's cover can be a marketing {wi}tool{/wi}

dt: {bc}one who is used or manipulated by another

dt.t: And then there was former trainer Pfeil, viewed as another {wi}tool{/wi} of management for his gruff ways.
Before you compete on a reality TV show, you basically sign away your right to protect yourself from looking like a total {wi}tool{/wi} in front of an international viewing audience.
has all the {wi}tools{/wi} to be a great pitcher

pt: {sc}implement{/sc} {sc}tool{/sc} {sc}instrument{/sc} {sc}appliance{/sc} {sc}utensil{/sc} mean a relatively simple device for performing work. {sc}implement{/sc} may apply to anything necessary to perform a task.
{sc}tool{/sc} suggests an implement adapted to facilitate a definite kind or stage of work and suggests the need of skill more strongly than {sc}implement{/sc}.
{sc}instrument{/sc} suggests a device capable of delicate or precise work.
{sc}appliance{/sc} refers to a tool or instrument utilizing a power source and suggests portability or temporary attachment.
{sc}utensil{/sc} applies to a device used in domestic work or some routine unskilled activity.

et: Middle English, from Old English {it}tōl{/it}; akin to Old English {it}tawian{/it} to prepare for use {ma}{mat|taw|}{/ma}
shortdef: a handheld device that aids in accomplishing a task
the cutting or shaping part in a machine or machine tool
a machine for shaping metal : machine tool

dt: {bc}to equip a plant or industry with the means (such as machines, machine {a_link|tools}, and instruments) of production
{bc}to shape, form, or finish with a tool
{bc}to letter or ornament (something, such as leather or gold) by means of hand tools
{bc}to equip (a factory, an industry, etc.) with tools, machines, and instruments for production

shortdef: to equip a plant or industry with the means (such as machines, machine tools, and instruments) of production —often used with up
to shape, form, or finish with a tool; especially : to letter or ornament (something, such as leather or gold) by means of hand tools

dt: {bc}a design (as on the binding of a book) made by {a_link|tooling}

shortdef: a design (as on the binding of a book) made by tooling

dt: {bc}a subject studied to gain competence in a skill used in other subjects

shortdef: a subject studied to gain competence in a skill used in other subjects

dt: {bc}to provide (a factory) with machines and tools for producing something

dt.t: The factory was not {it}tooled up{/it} for this type of production.

shortdef: to provide (a factory) with machines and tools for producing something

dt: {bc}a tool with a sharp cutting edge

shortdef: a tool with a sharp cutting edge

dt: {bc}a Stone-Age tool that is a flake of stone struck off from a larger piece

shortdef: a Stone-Age tool that is a flake of stone struck off from a larger piece —called also flake

dt: {bc}a machine designed for shaping solid work

shortdef: a machine designed for shaping solid work

dt: {bc}a compact, portable device that has blades and extensions for many tools (such as knives, screwdrivers, pliers, scissors, openers, and saw blades) which can be folded into the handle

dt.t: … it's good to know you have tools in the car to get you out of a pickle that your {wi}multi-tool{/wi} can't …
To my mind, the coolest feature is the {wi}multi-tool{/wi}, which sports a standard blade, serrated blade, screwdriver and bottle opener.
When a {wi}multitool{/wi} is all that stands between you and, say, a ten-mile walk home, you develop a certain loyalty to the most reliable one.

shortdef: a compact, portable device that has blades and extensions for many tools (such as knives, screwdrivers, pliers, scissors, openers, and saw blades) which can be folded into the handle
